result.execSummary:
Charge(s) in this case were read in to this or other case(s). A "read in" charge is a charge that is dismissed as part of a plea agreement, however:

  • The defendant agrees to have the court consider the charge(s) when sentencing for another crime, under Wis. Stats. 973.20(1g)(b); and
  • The defendant cannot be prosecuted for these charge(s) in the future.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Gregory S Glowacki

records.descr: Records of prosec. are converted data. See file.

records.addlTxt:
Defendant Gregory S Glowacki in court with attorney Katie Gutowski.  Defendant Gregory S Glowacki in custody.  Randall Schneider appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Court Reporter:  Darlene Shue
St:  In 13CF1495 - Plea to Ct 2 w/out RO & Ct 6 w/out RO, and in 13CF1743 plea to Ct 1 w/out RO; DRI balance and 14CF1017
Rights given
P - No Contest
BTC: Finding of guilt Cts 2 & 6 w/out RO in 13CF1498; and Ct 1 w/out RO in 13CF1743; DRI balance of charges and 14CF1017. 

Def - Req bond modified
St - Req court impose the $1,000 cash bond on 13CF1743
BTC: 13CF1743 - bond modified to $1,000 cash - no cont w/victim, no alc/cs - reg w/ZCI, GPS if released - monitored by ZCI, house arrest except for court, atty appts and work. 

  Sentencing hearing scheduled for October 13, 2014 at 02:00 pm.
Status conference on September 9, 2014 at 08:30 am.
Waiver of Preliminary hearing filed.  Probable cause found;  bound over.

Defendant Gregory S Glowacki in court with attorney Katie Gutowski.  Defendant Gregory S Glowacki in custody.  Randall Schneider appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Court Reporter: Lori Thornton.
Defense requests bond mod. State objects. 
BTC: Bond mod is denied.  Status conference scheduled for September 9, 2014 at 08:30 am.
Preliminary hearing on July 30, 2014 at 08:30 am.

Charges per attached criminal complaint. Conditions:  No contact with the victim (person, property, residence or family).   Defendant to be placed on GPS monitor through Zimmerman Consulting Inc. (ZCI), 524 Main Street, 3rd floor, (262-632-1780) exceptions are going to court, work and meeting w/his Atty.  Failure to appear will result in the issuance of a warrant for your arrest, possible bail jumping charges and forfeiture of any bond on deposit.

Defendant Gregory S Glowacki in court with attorney Gretchen G. Rosenke.  Defendant Gregory S Glowacki in custody.  Erika Frank Motsch appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Court Reporter: Lori Thornton.  Reading of complaint is waived, probable cause found, bond set.  Preliminary hearing scheduled for July 30, 2014 at 08:30 am.
